refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GBoxed ├── NMACountryInfo ├── NMAMobileAccessMethod ╰── NMAMobileProvider GObject ╰── NMAMobileProvidersDatabase

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the name of the method.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the username.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the password.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the gateway.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the list of DNS.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the 3GPP APN.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a NMAMobileFamily.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the name of the provider.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the list of NMAMobileAccessMethod this provider exposes.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a list of strings with the MCC and MNC codes this provider exposes.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the list of CDMA SIDs this provider exposes.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the code of the country or NULL for "Unknown".

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the name of the country.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the list of NMAMobileProvider this country exposes.

refsect2.title: nma_mobile_providers_database_new ()

entry.para: Path to the country codes file.
Path to the service providers file.
A GAsyncReadyCallback to call when the request is satisfied.
User data to pass to callback .
The GAsyncResult obtained from the GAsyncReadyCallback passed to nma_mobile_providers_database_new().
Return location for error or NULL.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The constructed object or NULL if error is set.

refsect2.title: nma_mobile_providers_database_new_sync ()

entry.para: Path to the country codes file.
Path to the service providers file.
Return location for error or NULL.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The constructed object or NULL if error is set.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a hash table where keys are country names gchar and values are NMACountryInfo.

entry.para: the country code string to look for.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a NMACountryInfo or NULL if not found.

entry.para: the MCC/MNC string to look for.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a NMAMobileProvider or NULL if not found.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a NMAMobileProvider, or NULL if not found.

refsect2.title: nma_mobile_providers_split_3gpp_mcc_mnc ()
refsect2.para: Splits the input MCCMNC string into separate MCC and MNC strings.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if correctly split and mcc and mnc are set; FALSE otherwise.

entry.para: Unknown or invalid network access method

refsect2.title: The country-codes property
refsect2.para: Path to the country codes file.

refsect2.title: The service-providers property
refsect2.para: Path to the service providers file.
